mapper.select: SELECT cell_id as cellId,bcch,BSIC from ( select DISTINCT c1.CELL_ID, c1.bcch , c1.BSIC from RNO_GSM_CELL c1, RNO_GSM_CELL c2 where c1.BCCH =c2.BCCH and c1.BSIC = c2.BSIC and c1.AREA_ID in (select id from RNO_SYS_AREA where PARENT_ID=#{areaIds}) and c2.AREA_ID in (select id from RNO_SYS_AREA where PARENT_ID= #{areaIds}) ORDER BY c1.bcch,c1.BSIC) where BCCH = #{bcch} and BSIC = #{bsic}

select DISTINCT c1.CELL_ID as cellId, c1.bcch , c1.bsic from RNO_GSM_CELL c1, RNO_GSM_CELL c2 where c1.BCCH =c2.BCCH and c1.BSIC = c2.BSIC and c1.AREA_ID in (select id from RNO_SYS_AREA where PARENT_ID=#{areaIds}) and c2.AREA_ID in (select id from RNO_SYS_AREA where PARENT_ID=#{areaIds}) ORDER BY c1.bcch,c1.BSIC
select * from RNO_GSM_NCELL_RELATION where NCELL_ID = ${sourceCell} and CELL_ID in (select CELL_ID from RNO_GSM_NCELL_RELATION where NCELL_ID = #{targetCell})
select * from RNO_GSM_NCELL_RELATION where CELL_ID = #{sourceCell} and NCELL_ID = #{targetCell}
select wmsys.wm_concat(LONGITUDE||','||LATITUDE) as lonlats from RNO_GSM_CELL where CELL_ID = #{sourceCell} or CELL_ID = #{targetCell}
